name: The Lost Bone
description:
The Lost Bone

Here is my first game, made in 4 weeks in Javascript with the famework p5.play.

It's an horror game where you need to kill as maximum of ennemis as you can and beat your best score ! 

  • Left/Right arrows to move
  • Press X to attack

Be careful, you have only 3 lives !

I have yet several ideas to develop, so there will be updates in the future to add more fun and difficulty.

I hope you'll have fun, do not hesitate to leave a comment below.

Enjoy !
